query:
SELECT n.id, n.opportunityId, n.leadId, n.content, n.createdAt, o.name as oppName
FROM notes n
LEFT JOIN opportunities o ON n.opportunityId = o.id
WHERE n.content LIKE '%Stage changed%'
ORDER BY n.createdAt DESC;
command:
